summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department and to City participation in the Urban Traffic Operation Program to Increase Capacity and Safety (TOPICS) pursuant to Ordinance 98606, authorizing an agreement with the State of Washington for reimbursement to the State of its costs incurred in connection with its review of plans, specifications and estimates of cost for a proposed street lighting project, and making an appropriation from the Arterial Development Fund therefor.
